name.baseName: Aluminum ingot casting ; Primary aluminum ingot ; Liquid primary aluminum ; 2017
铝锭铸造 ; 原生铝锭 ; 液态原铝 ; 2017年

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: This data set represents the process of casting primary aluminum ingots from liquid primary aluminum, as performed in the year 2017. It is intended for use in life cycle assessments of products where primary aluminum is a key material, such as in the construction, transportation, and electronics industries. Examples include the manufacture of aluminum components for vehicles, aircraft, infrastructure, and consumer electronics.
此数据集代表了2017年将液态原铝铸造成原生铝锭的过程。它适用于以原铝为关键材料的产品的生命周期评估，比如在建筑、运输和电子行业。例如，用于制造车辆、飞机、基础设施和消费电子产品的铝组件。

technology.technologicalApplicability: This data set represents the process of casting primary aluminum ingots from liquid primary aluminum, as performed in the year 2017. It is intended for use in life cycle assessments of products where primary aluminum is a key material, such as in the construction, transportation, and electronics industries. Examples include the manufacture of aluminum components for vehicles, aircraft, infrastructure, and consumer electronics.
此数据集代表了2017年将液态原铝铸造成原生铝锭的过程。它适用于以原铝为关键材料的产品的生命周期评估，比如在建筑、运输和电子行业。例如，用于制造车辆、飞机、基础设施和消费电子产品的铝组件。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data in this study refers to the LCA data of PA, SA, electricity, and other background data. The PA data were obtained from statistical data sources, and the SA data were mainly obtained from the literatures. The background data were mainly derived from the Chinese localization LCA database CAS RCEES 2018, which was established by the Research Center for Eco-Environmental Sciences, Chinese Academy of Sciences and covers LCA data for energy, materials, transportation, waste management etc.

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).
Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this data set in Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) studies, make sure to refer to the technology level and geographical relevance of the process for the assessed product. The PA (Primary Aluminum) data should be used to represent impacts associated with aluminum production. The SA (Secondary Aluminum) and other background data from the Chinese localization LCA database CAS RCEES 2018 should be used with consideration of their technological and temporal applicability to the case study. It is essential to apply this data consistently with the defined system boundaries and the goal of the LCA study.
在使用此数据集进行生命周期评估（LCA）研究时，请确保参考流程的技术水平和地理相关性以适配评估产品。PA（原生铝）数据应用于代表铝生产相关的影响。SA（次生铝）和其他来自中国本地化LCA数据库CAS RCEES 2018的背景数据应根据案例研究的技术和时间适用性进行考虑。重要的是要根据定义的系统边界和LCA研究的目标一致地应用此数据。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
